comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Christine Rice; in 1893 she married Rockwood Hoar (October 24, 1855 – November 1, 1906), a Representative from Massachusetts (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rockwood_Hoar). On November 25, 1915 she married Frederick Huntington Gillett (1851–1935), Representative from Massachusetts as well, see The New York Times, November 26, 1915 Frederick Huntington Gillett:

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for the additional info. We'll add her full name to our catalog record.
